ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Deities
ygData.msgSnippet: check east commons inns.. seems like I saw them there..   the main jewler is the one beside west commons..  but seems like the wolf s eye was at the houses
ygData.messageBody:
check east commons inns.. seems like I saw them there.. the main jewler is
the one beside west commons.. but seems like the wolf's eye was at the
houses beside freeport..

maybe someone just sold her one <shrug>





-----Original Message-----
From: Carol Testa [mailto:caroljt@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 08, 2000 9:44 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Deities


From: "Carol Testa" <caroljt@...>

I managed to make the "small protection deity" but was unable to equip it
anywhere. It says it is usable by Druids, Clerics, and Shamen and I am a
druid. It does not go into the shield slot as I expected. Is this still
"broken" in that it cannot be equipped?

My other question is where can I buy Wolf's Eye Agates outside Neraik?

Chrysiana
Druid on Cazic Thule
Master Potter
Pathfinders War Chief
